statements: SELECT * FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE matches_won > 10 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, matches_won, matches_lost FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE matches_lost >= 5 ORDER BY wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT wrestler_name, matches_drawn, popularity_score FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE popularity_score > 8.0 ORDER BY matches_drawn DESC;
SELECT wrestler_id, wrestler_name FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE matches_won + matches_lost > 15 ORDER BY wrestler_id;
SELECT * FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE wrestler_name LIKE '%John%' OR wrestler_name LIKE '%Mike%' ORDER BY wrestler_name;
SELECT * FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE matches_won > 10 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC, wrestler_name
SELECT wrestler_name, SUM(matches_won) AS total_wins FROM WrestlerRankings GROUP BY wrestler_name HAVING total_wins > 5 ORDER BY total_wins DESC
SELECT wrestler_name, (matches_won + matches_lost) AS total_matches, popularity_score FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE total_matches >= 20 ORDER BY total_matches ASC
SELECT MAX(popularity_score) AS highest_popularity FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE matches_won > 5
SELECT wrestler_id, wrestler_name, (matches_won * 2) AS total_wins FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE matches_won < 10 ORDER BY total_wins DESC, wrestler_name
SELECT * FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE match_wins > 10 ORDER BY wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT wrestler_name, popularity_rating FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE popularity_rating > 8 ORDER BY popularity_rating DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, match_wins, match_losses FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE match_losses > 5 ORDER BY match_wins DESC;
SELECT * FROM MatchResults WHERE result = 'Win' ORDER BY match_id ASC;
SELECT wrestler_name, result FROM MatchResults WHERE opponent_id = 3 ORDER BY wrestler_id;
SELECT wrestler_id, wrestler_name FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE match_wins > 10 ORDER BY popularity_rating DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, match_wins, match_losses FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE popularity_rating >= 8.0 ORDER BY match_wins DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, match_wins, match_losses, popularity_rating FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE match_losses BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY wrestler_id;
SELECT * FROM MatchResults WHERE result = 'Win' ORDER BY match_id DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, match_wins, match_losses, popularity_rating FROM WrestlerRankings WHERE match_wins > 5 AND popularity_rating < 7.5 ORDER BY wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_ranking FROM Wrestlers;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_popularity FROM Wrestlers ORDER BY wrestler_popularity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Matches WHERE match_result = 'Win';
SELECT wrestler_name, ranking_position FROM Wrestlers JOIN Rankings ON Wrestlers.wrestler_id = Rankings.wrestler_id;
SELECT wrestler_name, ranking_position FROM Wrestlers JOIN Rankings ON Wrestlers.wrestler_id = Rankings.wrestler_id ORDER BY ranking_position ASC;
SELECT * FROM Wrestlers;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_ranking FROM Wrestlers ORDER BY wrestler_ranking DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_popularity FROM Wrestlers WHERE wrestler_ranking > 5;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_ranking, ranking_position FROM Wrestlers INNER JOIN Rankings ON Wrestlers.wrestler_id = Rankings.wrestler_id WHERE Rankings.ranking_position <= 3;
SELECT Wrestlers.wrestler_name, Matches.match_date, Matches.match_result FROM Wrestlers JOIN Matches ON Wrestlers.wrestler_id = Matches.wrestler_id ORDER BY Matches.match_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Wrestlers;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_age FROM Wrestlers WHERE wrestler_age > 25;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_position FROM Wrestlers WHERE wrestler_position = 'Champion';
SELECT * FROM Matches ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_nationality FROM Wrestlers WHERE wrestler_nationality = 'USA' AND wrestler_position = 'Mid-Carder';
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_age FROM Wrestlers WHERE wrestler_age > 30;
SELECT match_date, match_location FROM Matches ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_position, rank_position FROM Wrestlers w INNER JOIN Rankings r ON w.wrestler_id = r.wrestler_id WHERE rank_position <= 3;
SELECT fan_name, fan_email FROM Fans WHERE fan_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY fan_name ASC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_nationality FROM Wrestlers WHERE wrestler_nationality IN ('USA', 'Japan');
SELECT * FROM wrestlers;
SELECT name, debut_date FROM wrestlers ORDER BY debut_date DESC;
SELECT name, total_matches FROM wrestlers WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM matches WHERE duration_min > 30;
SELECT name, country FROM promotions;
SELECT * FROM wrestlers WHERE active = TRUE
SELECT name, total_matches FROM wrestlers ORDER BY total_matches DESC
SELECT wrestlers.name, matches_1.venue FROM wrestlers JOIN matches AS matches_1 ON wrestlers.wrestler_id = matches_1.winner_id

SELECT wrestlers.name, rankings_1.rank_order FROM wrestlers JOIN rankings AS rankings_1 ON wrestlers.wrestler_id = rankings_1.wrestler_id WHERE rankings_1.promotion_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_matches, SUM(matches_won) AS total_wins, SUM(matches_lost) AS total_losses FROM wrestlers
